summary: A small lodge where men can be drunken pigs
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][b][u]DrNewcenstein's Elks Lodge for Skyrim[/u][/b][/size][/center]

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN (sorry for not mentioning that earlier).


I realized what was missing from Skyrim: a Moose Lodge! Last bastion of Freemasons rejects, these hallowed halls are where "Boy's Night Out" originated; a place where men could gather and drink and watch dancing girls dance on tables and get away from their oppressive housewives and demanding family. A place where Men could be Pigs.

But, since there are no Moose in Skyrim, I couldn't very well do a Moose Lodge.

There's also no Water Buffalo, so I couldn't go Fred Flintstone, either.

But there are Elk, and while the Elks are a slightly more respectible bunch than your average Moose Lodger, they still throw down, but without worrying about the whole "Shriner" thing.

This is not a player home, so I don't suggest storing anything you want to keep.

The Lodge is located outside Dawnstar, just past and across from Windward Ruins.

Enjoy, and try not to take it too seriously.

Installation:
Unzip and drop the contents into your Skyrim folder. Everything should go into place (Data/meshes/etc).
author: DrNewcenstein
